comments.body: 1) What rate?2) Where are you located? comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: ICYNOTE2023 on July 24, 2023, 02:43:55 PMdoes this site have complicated terms? because I've been to several sites and they ask for ID photos, selfie photos.But you can read their reviews, terms of service and privacy policy to get all the information you need1. https://www.trustpilot.com/review/www.localcoinswap.com2. https://localcoinswap.com/terms-of-service3. https://localcoinswap.com/privacyMy understanding is that they have no mandatory KYC.
